fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 112.20 lakh crore compared with Rs 394.01 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 98.40 points or 0.55% to settle at 17,956.60. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, dropped 5.33% to 14.46. Reliance Industries (RIL), Infosys and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
